featured.text: This is when the largest female in the group begins to change in appearance.
It has been a market favorite since its first appearance.
As a result, Jeanie was invited to make a number of public appearances with her Kiddie Stool, and was featured on local TV as well as in newspapers.
26 some six hundred years of architecture nearly untouched by natural disaster or war, the city retains much of its medieval appearance.

other.text: Laughter, too, has a beneficial effect on our immune system, (38) the production of white blood cells and increasing our resistance to infection.(39) makes a difference to our appearance, too, when we relax our facial muscles!
The women in the story __(23)__ birth to children that have the same appearance.

definition.zh_def: 外觀；出現的樣子或形象。
definition.en_def: The way that someone or something looks; the outward aspect or image.
definition.example: Her appearance at the event surprised everyone.
